movies.title: Les loups
movies.plot: Elie, a young woman from the city, has come to a remote North Atlantic island. It's the spring thaw, and she is here to convalesce and get to know the community. The annual seal hunt is in full swing, and Elie feels both drawn to and repelled by the men engaged in it. In this isolated world, people's lives and deaths are shaped by the brute forces of nature. Elie's presence arouses curiosity and mistrust. Maria, the village matriarch and den mother, seeks to uncover the secret reason behing Elie's visit. Wolves explores the profound need for belonging.
movies.simplePlot: Elie, a young woman from the city, has come to a remote North Atlantic island. It's the spring thaw, and she is here to convalesce and get to know the community. The annual seal hunt is in ...

biography.bio: Cindy-Mae Arsenault is an actor, known for Les loups (2014).
biography.name: Cindy-Mae Arsenault

biography.bio: Evelyne Brochu was born on November 17, 1983 in Montreal, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for Inch'Allah (2012), Café de Flore (2011) and Tom à la ferme (2013).
biography.name: Evelyne Brochu

biography.bio: Benoît Gouin was born on January 27, 1961 in Pointe-du-Lac, Québec, Canada. He is an actor and writer, known for I Killed My Mother (2009), Gabrielle (2013) and Le monde de Charlotte (2000).
biography.name: Benoît Gouin

biography.bio: Augustin Legrand was born in 1975 in Neuville-aux-Bois, Loiret, France. He is an actor and director, known for 13 Tzameti (2005), Flyboys (2006) and Les rivières pourpres 2 - Les anges de l'apocalypse (2004).
biography.name: Augustin Legrand

biography.bio: Louise Portal was born on May 12, 1950 in Chicoutimi, Québec, Canada as Louise Lapointe. She is an actress, known for The Barbarian Invasions (2003), The Decline of the American Empire (1986) and Heading South (2005).
biography.name: Louise Portal

biography.bio: Gilbert Sicotte was born on February 18, 1948 in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Léolo (1992), Trauma (2010) and Fortier (2001).
biography.name: Gilbert Sicotte

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Nominated Prize of the City of Torino
